description:
The 9th Universe’s third combatant tries to talk Zeno out of erasing losing universes. Zeno agrees on one condition: the 9th Universe must win the exhibition match. However, if Goku throws the fight, all universes will suffer the consequences!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bergamo der Zerquetscher gegen Goku! – Wer von ihnen verfügt über grenzenlose Kraft!
Bergamo the Crusher vs Son Goku! Which One Wields the Limitless Power?!
Tsubushi no Bergamo vs Son Gokuu! Aotenjou no Tsuyosa wa Docchi Da!?
潰しのベルガモVS孫悟空! 青天井の強さはどっちだ!?
